entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
